text: @realDonaldTrump Hahaha 😂 you’re spinning again tRump. Go sell those lies to your IQ-compromised base, the ones who emptied shelves of their local stores of bleach & Lysol soon after you suggested that drinking or injecting the stuff into the body could cure #COVID19.
